info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 2:57PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Hamilton and east central Herkimer Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 257 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles south of Limekiln Lake Campground, or 17 miles southeast of Old Forge, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Speculator, Lake Pleasant, Lewey Lake Campground, Moffitt Beach Campground, Perkins Clearing, Rudeston, West Canada Lakes, Herkimer Landing, Caswell Lake, Mountain Home, Sled Harbor, Piseco, Morehouseville, Hoffmeister and Gilmantown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for eastern New York.
